edu.xtec.jclic.boxes

Class BoxBag

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • edu.xtec.jclic.boxes.AbstractBox
            • edu.xtec.jclic.boxes.BoxBag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resizable, Shape, Serializable, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActiveBoxBag

    public class BoxBag
extends AbstractBox
implements Cloneable, Resizable
    A BoxBag is a class derived from AbstractBox that contains a collection of "boxes" (objects also derived from AbstractBox). The boxes are stores into a protected ArrayList. The class implements methods to add, remove and retrieve boxes, and to manage some of its properties like visibility, status, location and size.
    Version:
    13.09.23
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
